risk_description: PostGIS spatial query performance degradation under high load, threatening the P95 < 250ms latency requirement for service routing.
root_cause: Complex ST_Contains/ST_Distance queries on large datasets without optimized spatial indexing or read-replica utilization.
mitigation_strategy: Implement rigorous spatial indexing (GIST) on PostgreSQL; offload read-heavy routing queries to Azure DB Read Replicas; implement Redis caching for frequent service area lookups.
contingency_plan: Fallback to simple postal-code based matching if geospatial queries time out; horizontal scaling of database resources.
monitoring_trigger: Database query latency exceeding 200ms for routing endpoints; CPU utilization on DB primary node > 80%.

risk_description: Data synchronization conflicts and data loss in Technician Mobile App due to complex offline-first architecture using WatermelonDB/SQLite.
affected_tasks: WI-MOB-002 (Implement Offline Data Sync), WI-MOB-004 (Signature Capture)
root_cause: Concurrency issues when syncing local SQLite changes with backend state after prolonged offline periods, specifically regarding job status transitions.
mitigation_strategy: Design strict 'Last-Write-Wins' or 'Server-Authority' conflict resolution policies; implement transactional sync queues; create extensive unit tests for sync adapter edge cases.
contingency_plan: Implement a manual 'Force Sync' override for technicians; log conflicting data to a separate audit table for manual reconciliation.
monitoring_trigger: Sync error rates > 1% in mobile app telemetry; increasing volume of 'conflict' logs in backend.

risk_description: Azure AD B2C custom policy complexity causing delays in delivering Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and user authentication.
root_cause: Steep learning curve of Identity Experience Framework (IEF) XML configuration and integration of custom claims for multi-tenant RBAC.
mitigation_strategy: Engage Azure Identity specialist or allocate senior resource specifically for B2C; prototype authentication flow immediately; stick to standard user flows where possible before custom XML.
contingency_plan: Temporarily implement simplified role management within the local database while debugging B2C custom policies.
monitoring_trigger: Authentication integration testing failures; delays in finalizing the JWT token structure definition.

risk_description: WebSocket Gateway connection saturation preventing real-time location tracking (<2s latency) during peak concurrent usage.
affected_tasks: WI-RT-001 (Develop WebSocket Gateway), WI-MOB-003 (Background Location Tracking)
root_cause: Inadequate horizontal scaling configuration for NestJS WebSocket Gateway and Redis adapter bottlenecks under 10k+ concurrent connections.
mitigation_strategy: Implement Redis Adapter for socket.io/NestJS to enable multi-node broadcast; configure Horizontal Pod Autoscaling (HPA) based on active connection metrics; load test with 20k virtual users.
contingency_plan: Throttle location update frequency (e.g., from 5s to 15s) to reduce message volume; shard WebSocket traffic by region.
monitoring_trigger: WebSocket heartbeat failures; Redis CPU > 70%; Message delivery latency > 1s.

risk_description: Memory leaks and process crashes in Node.js Bulk Import Worker when processing large CSV files.
root_cause: Loading entire files into memory instead of using Node.js streams; inefficient garbage collection during batch database inserts.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate usage of Node.js Streams API for file processing; implement batch processing with fixed chunk sizes (e.g., 1000 rows); strict memory limits on pods.
contingency_plan: Split large files into smaller chunks upon upload before processing; increase container memory limits temporarily.
monitoring_trigger: Worker pod restarts (OOMKilled status); memory usage exceeding 80% limit during import jobs.

risk_description: Cost overruns and rate limiting from third-party Mapbox/Azure Maps APIs due to high-frequency technician tracking.
root_cause: Inefficient client-side polling or excessive geocoding requests triggering pay-per-request billing tiers.
mitigation_strategy: Implement caching for map tiles; debounce location updates sent to mapping APIs; set strict budget alerts in Azure Cost Management.
contingency_plan: Switch to open-source alternatives (OpenStreetMap) for non-critical map layers; reduce tracking resolution.
monitoring_trigger: API usage reaching 80% of daily quota; projected monthly cost exceeding budget forecasts.
